attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The NICE guidelines suggest treatments such as Cognitive Behavioural Therapy and Graded Exercise.

However, recent research has found new information relating to the biology of M.E. (which is also known as CFS). 

These new findings show that treatment such as Cognitive Behavioural Therapy is not appropriate. Rather, investment into biomedical research is needed to find treatments that shall provide relief for M.E. sufferers.
